name: HoldefiPrices
description: HoldefiPrices contract. This contract uses Chainlink Oracle to get the tokens priceThe address of ETH asset considered as 0xEeeeeEeeeEeEeeEeEeEeeEEEeeeeEeeeeeeeEEeEError codes description: E01: Asset should not be ETH. This contract is for getting tokens price.

eventDecorators.name: NewPriceAggregator
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a new price aggregator is set for an asset.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferRequested
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is recieved.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

functionDecorators.name: acceptTransferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Pending owner accepts ownership of the contract. Only Pending owner can call this function.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetAmountFromValue
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the given amount based on the given asset value.

returnDecorators.name: res
returnDecorators.description: Amount calculated for asset based on the price and given value.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetValueFromAmount
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the given asset value based on the given amount.

returnDecorators.name: res
returnDecorators.description: Value calculated for asset based on the price and given amount.

functionDecorators.name: getPrice
functionDecorators.description: Gets price of selected asset from Chainlink. The ETH price is assumed to be 1.

functionDecorators.name: setPriceAggregator
functionDecorators.description: Sets price aggregator for the given asset.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner. Can only be called by the current owner.
